TopicTitle: 1.0.4 career mode: Tech tree in Science Center has vanished

Articles.Content:
After updating to 1.0.4 the tech tree in my career mode game has vanished. When I switch to the Science Center the UI display is empty. No nodes are shown and I can't select anything.

Windows 8.1

KSP 1.0.4

Steam

Hi Nigeth, please open your persistent.sfs file in your save game folder and look for this line.

> 
> TechTreeUrl = GameData/ModuleManager.TechTree

Change it to this line.

> 
> TechTreeUrl = GameData/Squad/Resources/TechTree.cfg
